item.title: LaTeX Quick Notes
item.description: Here you can find a minimal starting guide to work on latex. Some simple syntax for margins, basic text variations, headings, equations, images and tables are included. Before starting, enable word wrapping in VSCodium: File → Preferences → Settings → Word Wrap → ON This makes LaTeX source files far easier to read and maintain. 1. Start with a main file Always create a central entry point: main.tex This file defines the document layout and imports all other content.
